OCC: Thanks Moon Mist.

The spark glowed brightly and lowered to BrightBlade's head level when it
heard the name Gangon being called by BrightBlade...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 9:05 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
> * BrightBlade nodded as Perndabot turned to lead her towards the new
> Maximals base but then stopped when he did, hearing the same desgusted
sound
> coming from Reptilica as Perndabot did.
> She watches the scene the same as before, simply wondering in the power of
> the Alliance bot beside her.
> Sometimes she liked a male the showed off, this obviously being just one
of
> those times.
> She smiled as she saw Reptilica go inconcious and then coucht bu
> Bloodystriker, then turning her smile towards Perndabot as he threatened
> them all.
> This was just turning out to be better and better!
> Even though she knew he was an Alliance member and she a Predacon she
> couldn't help but feel a bit more of desire towards him, his show of power
> simply giving more light to the subject.
> She watched Perndabot lift Reptilica ti his shoulder, a little
disappointed
> that the bot had to tag along when she thought that it was only going to
be
> Perndabot escorting her.
> But then she shrugged, if he interfeared againshe would simply slag him,
> nothing too diffacult.
> BrightBlade then began to follw after Perndabot as he began to move off
> towards the Cybertronien Fire but then stopped in her tracks when she did,
> wondering why he had stopped.
> BrightBlade smiled up at him as she heard his words, understanding his
> concern.*
>
> " It's a stealth mission. I'm gethering vitle data about the new ship for
my
> Lord Hell Beast. Infultrating the base and figuring out their weapons, how
> they work, weaknesses in the shields, security systems and all."
>
> * After answering Perndabot's question she then began to continue in the
> direction the the new Maximal base, taking the lead but taking care to let
> her hips swing a bit. Wondering that with all her comments towards him, if
> Perndabot was going to say anything towards her.
> It had been so long since she had last heard a comment on her looks,
Gangon
> being the first and last bot that had ever said anything.
> But with him gone she felt a bit...unappresiated.
> With all her loyalty towards Hell Beast he didn't once reward her for it,
> just simply wanting a pat on the back or an encuraging word. But nothing.
> Nobot ever even noticing her, except in battle when they were trying to
kill
> her!
> But now she found someone who she actually liked, fairly much. But he was
on
> the wrong side, if he were a Predacon then things would be much better.
> But without any words towards her from him then she just didn't know if he
> liked her...besides his wondering optics.
> BrightBlade sighed but then nearly gasped when she suddenly saw a flash of
> light.
> Blinking a few times she stopped in her tracks and squinted, finally
> noticing that it was a spark!
> She quickly scanned it, turning out to be Gangon's spark she smiled at it.
> Though to make sure she then spoke.*
>
> " Gangon? "
>
